app.title: Atomic UI
filters.title: Filters
table.title: Records
table.headers.name: Name
demo.project.title: Project Information
demo.project.subtitle: Atomic Design Philosophy
demo.project.description: Atomic UI is a modern Angular implementation based on the Atomic Design methodology. We strive for maximum modularity by breaking down the interface into its fundamental elements.
demo.project.tech: The project leverages the latest Angular features: Standalone Components, Signals for reactive state management, and an architecture optimized for performance.
demo.components.title: Component Information
demo.components.subtitle: Component Architecture
demo.components.description: Each component is independent, reusable, and customizable via Design Tokens (CSS Variables). This ensures absolute visual consistency and facilitates large-scale maintenance.
